abstract.t: The PKIX working group is profiling the use of X.509 attributecertificates. This document specifies a deliberately limitedprotocol for requesting an attribute certificate from a server. Itis intended to be complementary to the use of LDAP for AC retrieval,covering, for example, those cases where use of an LDAP server isnot suitable due to the type of authorization model being employed.For many other cases, the use of LDAP is preferred.
